title: Thoughts on the Sam Harris and Jordan Peterson Debates
description:
These are a few thoughts on Sam Harris' ideas coming through in the Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris debates.  This was taken from my monthly symbolism seminar with Patreon supporters.  

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
